references.reason: This paper introduces the MaskGIT architecture, which is adapted in the proposed VATT model for efficient audio generation through masked token modeling.
This paper presents SoundStorm, a highly efficient parallel audio generation model that uses masked token modeling, a key technique also used in the proposed VATT model.
This paper introduces VGGSound, a large-scale audio-visual dataset used for training and evaluating the proposed VATT model.

references.paper_title: Audio set: An ontology and human-labeled dataset for audio events
references.reason: This paper introduces AudioSet, another large-scale audio-visual dataset used in the training and evaluation of VATT.
This paper introduces a multi-modal LLM which is adapted in the proposed VATT model to process both video and text inputs for controllable audio generation.
